page.title: 06A Teachers day part 2
page.content: 10.40 and break arrives for both staff and children(except for the teacher on playground duty).After break the pattern is much the same as before with perhaps either T.V. or P.E. depending on the timetable. After lunch(12.00-1.15)the afternoon takes a less formal pattern with project work,art & craft,games or music. After school at 3.15 I am involved in football training(Monday & Thursday) until 4.30 but during the football season matches have also to be fitted in.Apart from football,mounting work, meetings etc.also happen at this time. My journey home can start at 4.30 - 5.00 and(traffic allowing)I arrive home 30 minutes later. My day ends about 10.30p.m.when,after watching T.V. in the evening,I go to bed.
